price: አላህ ከንግግር በክፉው መጮህን ከተበደለ ሰው (ጩኸት) በቀር አይወድም፡፡ አላህ ሰሚ ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: ۞ لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yuḥibbu al-lahu al-jahra bil-sūi mina al-qawli illā man ẓulima wakāna al-lahu samīʿan ʿalīman
